abilities.name: Lightning Beam
about: Creates a laser beam on a player until player goes out of sight or out of range

abilities.name: Storm Call
about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast

abilities.name: Summon Lightning Warp Totem
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter

abilities.name: Spark
about: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
